attributes.action: encourage news media to report troop casualties as top story
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With more and more of our troops dying overseas and suffering injuries on our behalf at the Government's behest the British Public should be made aware of this sacrifice by making deaths and casualties as the lead item in any broadcast. If the cause that are suffering for is just why not move it up the news agenda, swine flu and expenses are importatnt of course but so are our men and women.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
